LaundryIndexText: Learn more about our laundry services, laundry equipment & supplies, and wimala
LaundryOkaasanText: Okaasan Laundry is committed to providing laundry services with the quality of a five-star hotel, by implementing 5S -seiri/sort, seiton/set in order, seisou/shine, seiketsu/standar-ize, shitsuke/sustain. The list describes how to organize a work space for efficiency and effectiveness by identifying and storing the items used, maintaining the area and items, and sustaining the new organizational system. The decision-making process usually comes from a dialogue about standardization, which builds understanding among employees of how they should do the work.

AgencyIndexText: Learn more about our events and our strategic marketing agency.
AgencyEventText: Gallery of Devavrata events through years.
AgencyStrategicMarketingText: One of the most important thing to bring success to each laundry outlet is to communicate to its market regards its services and all the necessary details which can bring good revenue and profit. PT Devavrata provide specific business unit which can provide the correct communication strategy by considering the circumstances of the local environment from each outlet.
AgencyStrategicMarketingService1Text: Social media are one of the important tools to accompany your business daily activities.
AgencyStrategicMarketingService2Text: Photo and video production is the process of conceptualizing all the way to distributing photos and videos.
AgencyStrategicMarketingService3Text: Website development is the tasks associated with creating, building, and maintaining websites.
AgencyStrategicMarketingSocialMediaText: Everyday people spend hours on their phone and through this millennial era, many decisions are made based on what customer see on social media.
AgencyStrategicMarketingSocialMediaCard1: Serve the best visual appearance through design.
AgencyStrategicMarketingSocialMediaCard2: Engagement with the target market through contents.

AgencyStrategicMarketingWebsiteText: We help our clients to set up and maintain their website, that also includes design, UI/UX, content writing, optimize search, and more.
AgencyStrategicMarketingWebsiteProject1T: PT. STRAITS LAUNDRY INDONESIA is a distributor appointed by Alliance Laundry System LLC, USA in Indonesia as a provider of laundry equipment & spare parts. We sell Primus brand laundry machines and offer Laundromat business packages with leading laundry machines in its class: Primus.
AgencyResearchMarketingText: Focuses on gathering data and insights, such as understanding customer needs, market trends, and competitor analysis. With this research, PT Devavrata Sinergi Indonesia can design more effective communication strategies, ensuring that each laundry service reaches the right target market, ultimately driving revenue and profitability for the outlets.
AgencyResearchMarketing1Text: It's all about who our customers are! This includes their age, gender, occupation, and habits. It helps us understand their needs and preferences better.
AgencyResearchMarketing2Text: This covers where our customers live, such as cities, regions, or specific neighborhoods. It's essential for targeting the right areas.
AgencyResearchMarketingDemographicText: This page contain information about your target audience based on demographic characteristics, such as age, gender, income, education, and occupation.
AgencyResearchMarketingDemographicSubJud: Getting to Know Who Okaasan Laundry Serves
AgencyResearchMarketingDemographicLangka: Steps to Opening a Laundry Outlet
Mapping Locations on Google Maps.
Use Google Maps to determine strategic locations with easy access and appropriate population density.
Conduct a Site Survey
Conduct a site survey to evaluate the supporting facilities and neighborhood conditions.
Demographic Analysis
Analyze the demographics of the area to determine the target audience based on their needs and characteristics.
Evaluate Competitors
Study nearby competitors by noting their numbers, types of services, and strengths.
Determine the Main Service Types
Choose a key service type that sets your outlet apart, such as laundry express or specialty services.
Making Capital Calculations
Make capital calculations for operational needs, equipment, and business promotion.
Preparing business legality
Take care of business legality, such as business licenses and other official documents.
Setting up Equipment and Technology
Prepare quality equipment and supporting technology such as laundry management software.
Promotion Strategy
Design a promotional strategy by utilizing social media and offering attractive opening promosi.
Recruiting Employees
Hire experienced or trainable employees to ensure quality service.
Determining the Membership System
Offer a membership program with benefits such as special discounts and a points system.
Trial and Evaluation
Conduct operational trials through soft opening and evaluation in preparation for grand opening.
AgencyResearchMarketingGeographicText: This page focus on the geographical location of your target market, for example, Jabodetabek, Tangerang, and surrounding areas.
AgencyResearchMarketingGeographicCard1Te: Displays a map of outlet locations or service coverage with highlights on key areas such as South Jakarta, Depok, and Bekasi.
AgencyResearchMarketingGeographicCard2Te: As many as 80% of customers come from urban areas of Jabodetabek, while 20% come from Tangerang and surrounding areas.
AgencyResearchMarketingGeographicCard3Te: The strategic location is an advantage, with the majority of customers coming from residential areas and apartments in the city center.
